ai-anya-e0808n4:1_0: ‘We have not found in the lotus pond’, and we have served the day.
ai-anya-e0808n4:2_0: Island the kingdom of the winter exceedingly sweetness in the path.
ai-anya-e0808n4:3_0: I was worshipped by the victors, assembled in the evening time, and furnishing (the next) the day.
ai-anya-e0808n4:4_0: Nor covetousness, (the Buddha), being full of joy and generations,
ai-anya-e0808n4:5_0: Seven on renown, Yasa with its sal trees, and so on,
ai-anya-e0808n4:13_0: (All these) will not be seen (wholesome) desire arose amongst all beings,
ai-anya-e0808n4:14_0: let the ascetic life span of the ascetic life.
ai-anya-e0808n4:15_0: So it is said in the Commentary: “Similarations too that “has the Description of Saṁsāra” .
